column1: 4117,Welfare Support Workers,,"Help clients get needed services or resources
column3: Refer clients to community or social service programs
column5: Advise others on social or educational issues
column7: Interview clients to gather information about their backgrounds, needs or progress
column9: Collaborate with other professionals to assess client needs or plan treatments
column13: Monitor health or behaviour of people
column15: Counsel clients or patients regarding personal issues
column19: Develop plans for programs or services",0.1444918484170823
